pullrequest.title: Part 2: port PluginPtrSemantics to new repository

content.raw:
I tried compiling on my home computer which is running bionic. This warning didn’t seem to appear when compiling with either gcc \(7.3.0\) or clang \(6.0.0\), so I don’t know whether [532c6c6](#!/ignitionrobotics/ign-plugin/commits/532c6c6) will have actually fixed it or not.

Do you know if there’s anything special about your configuration that might have gotten the warning to print for you?
content.html:
I tried compiling on my home computer which is running bionic. This warning didn’t seem to appear when compiling with either gcc (7.3.0) or clang (6.0.0), so I don’t know whether 532c6c6 will have actually fixed it or not.

Do you know if there’s anything special about your configuration that might have gotten the warning to print for you?
